entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -13.5°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
